summary: Diff introduces reusable non-slider input primitives (StepperInput, ChipsInput) and applies them to NutritionCard and StressCard; it also uses ChronographDial as a primary control in FastingTimer (fastingHours) and SleepCard (sleepQuality). Global CSS utilities were expanded to support the luxury/glass look and subtle transitions. Based on the provided diff summary, most requested slider replacements appear implemented for the shown routine cards, but the BodyCompositionCard changes are truncated so full verification is limited.

hallucinated_features.description: Hold-to-repeat/accelerated stepping interaction on StepperInput (+/- buttons repeat after 500ms and then every 100ms).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQs asked for stepper replacements and smooth transitions, but did not explicitly request press-and-hold acceleration behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new contextual fasting feedback copy including iconography (e.g., '⚡ Extended fasting', '→ Build up to 16h for autophagy').
hallucinated_features.reason: REQs focused on replacing sliders and keeping existing calculations/save flow; adding new coaching/feedback messaging was not explicitly requested.
